website_summaries.verdict: This scaled-down yet regulation-height table is incredibly durable and easy to store. It's an excellent choice for ping-pong fans working around a small space.
pros: Miniature ping-pong table measures 71” L x 40.5” W x 30”
Easy to fold and disassemble for storage
Leg levelers provide a flat playing surface
cons: This small table is heavier than you would expect it to be

customer_reviews.title: super easy to fold and set up
customer_reviews.text: This is what I call a 10/10 satisfaction. High quality surface. super easy to fold and set up. endless fun to play. 6 feet long is not that bad. Get used to it very soon. You can still use all the normal technique. just adjust a bit. I would say the smallest space you need have is 12 feet long. That is exactly the size of space I have. I feel still a bit short. I wish I could back up a bit more sometimes. 14 feet would be ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Lijia Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Concerns with this nice table
customer_reviews.text: We are giving this very lovely little ping pong table 1 star because it arrived with 5 broken screws (pics) that hold and fold the legs and some brackets were missing screws. Without this problem we’d give it 5 stars without question and would have been very pleased with the purchase. It sure feels sturdy and well made as stated in many reviews. A concern is that since 5 screws failed, other screws may have been defective or over-tightened. It was just luck noticing the small screw heads in the large box after setting it up. Amazon was great in working with us for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: woodworker

customer_reviews.title: Play in 10 minutes!
customer_reviews.text: Playability: Easy to put together and instantly play. Very quick to put together (simply match table halves, grip posts, and stretch net!) Note: would be a good idea to include paddles and balls Quality: Durable and made with heavy-weight materials, important for keeping a table from moving around. Aesthetics: simple and clean graphics Assembly: stated earlier- easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: M.H.

customer_reviews.title: The size is so right!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really great quality and value for the price, and the size is perfect for my basement. Used to have a standard, this little one is no less enjoyable. Perfect for kids. It's a much more finesse game at the smaller scale, you can't smash the ball like you can in full-size, but we don't mind. There isn't really any assembly, just fold it out, put the net on and play! I did put some sticky pad feed on it for my faux-wood flooring, it slid around too easily.
customer_reviews.author: Nick R

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Table
customer_reviews.text: We love to play table tennis when we get the chance but our home is too small to accommodate a regulation size table. This Stiga table is awesome! Just the right size and it is incredibly sturdy. We are finding that practicing on a smaller table really sharpens your game for when playing on a standard size table. Also- you can easily remove the net, add a table pad and use the table for craft projects. I could not be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Lollybee

customer_reviews.title: table tennis table
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Had only small damaged on two corners where box had been crunched despite more than adequate packing with both corrugated cardboard and small 1/4 " MDF around inside of box. The table sets up nicely. It is a compact table but much bigger than others allowing for greater play area. Heavier than others due to metal framing but sturdy even on uneven paver surface. Tale top is nice and smooth with an adequate bounce surface. Great for small places.. Easy storage. Definitely recommend to those with limited space
customer_reviews.author: Mario F.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy construction and good bounce
customer_reviews.text: Good table. Solid top with good bounce. Fairly heavy and not too easy for one person to move. I appreciate the weight as I believe it is indicative of heavy weight/sturdy materials. Seems well built. My net is not like the one pictured. It has a solid sleeve that fits around the net post. The net seems is made of a light weight mesh, but isn't bad as it is securely attached to posts via the solid sleeve. Would highly reccomend if you don't have room for a full size table.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Best quality space saver table
customer_reviews.text: There is no assembly needed,just open the package and set the net and play .Nice sturdy table worth the price ,you cannot play solo in this table .This is a beginner table .This is the first table that we own ,purchased it after several reviews in Amazon and on google.Best purchase ever .The table dimensions are specified on the listing.
customer_reviews.author: vajra2402

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product. Perfect sized table for inside our game room. Perfect sized table for our tween and teen kids. Great quality and versatility since the two halves can be used as general purpose tables. Set up and storage is quick and couldn't be easier. We were playing in 5 minutes after we unboxed the two tables. Keep in mind that it's not a "regulation sized" table. That's what makes it so cool. Couldn't be happier. I suspect that this will lead to the purchase of a STIGA full-sized table for the garage/backyard. We are about to have a big storm. Let the tournament begin!
customer_reviews.author: David Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Love this ping pong table!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! So much fun ... sooooo easy to assemble!! I was initially worried when it arrived as the box was really - but once you open the box the two pieces are very manageable and again — happily surprised on how easy it was to put together (especially as I didn’t have my hubby to help out as it was a Xmas gift for him and our son). Hours of entertainment ... and hours away from the iPad for my son! : ) Seems easy to store, too ... although haven’t put it away yet because we keep playing it. Perfect size - as not too overwhelming. Enjoy!!
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Needs better quality control but excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Table is ok, but not happy about their quality control. One of the legs was mounted backwards and so the leg didn't open. I fixed this but the hinge is too short and the leg is crooked (see photo). Amazon gives no way to contact the seller which is frustrating and I would rather not return it. Other than that the table seems ok. Added: just was contacted by Amazon and the offered to resolve the problem and I am satisfied with their response.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M Zaid

customer_reviews.title: Great table for kids
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy table. Was quite surprised with the overall weight and construction of the table. This will certainly last. The playing surface is very good with good response/bounce for its thickness. Would have given it 5 stars, but the one of the corners was a little damaged. Will update this review after a few months of playing to see how it fairs after a lot of use. Also, cant see why anyone would need to purchase assembly with the table. Its very easy to do. Just be aware that the table is heavy.
customer_reviews.author: H P

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: This table is quite heavy. We opened the box outside where it was delivered and brought it inside one piece at a time to assemble it. All the parts were there and we assembled it in minutes. It does fold easily and takes up little space in my bedroom closet. The table is smaller than the standard size table but didn't take too long to figure out how to hit the ball and keep it on the table. We played for 90 minutes the first time we set it up. It was quite fun! We are retired and were looking for something we could do together at home. The table seems to be quite sturdy and of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Christine A

customer_reviews.title: The quality of this tennis table is much better then I expected as a matter of fact I ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this tennis table is much better then I expected as a matter of fact I thought it would be a little cheesy. Yes I would buy it again and again. I love the playabilty, the aesthetics and easy assembly. I am 74 years old and I bought it for my 10 year old grand daughter she loves it and so does her uncle, aunts and cousins who play table tennis with her on this table. We also enjoy being able to use it as a card table. it is really worth the money
customer_reviews.author: ms rabia

customer_reviews.title: Fun to be Had With This Size Table.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome table for those that have conquered at one time or the other!! Already got my spin back on, my spikes are on the table (most of the time 8-)). You will not be disappointed in this purchase of a space saving table.
customer_reviews.author: Tom & Alma San Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: Good quality same as Stiga regulation tables
customer_reviews.text: We remodeled our small basement lately. Based on the reviews, we purchased this table. What a good decision! My two daughters of 10 and 15 could not stop playing on the first night when the table was set up. Before that, they always complained about playing Pingpong was too difficult on a regulation table as they could not reach certain spots. The light blue color looks professional, which let them feel the "real deal". As a good ping-pong player myself, I also enjoyed playing on this compact table and would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Dolphin J.

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for smaller spaces
customer_reviews.text: I got this table for my 9 year old son. Our basement and backyard deck are not big enough for a full size table. Good quality, super easy to set-up and a lot of fun. I play with him so okay for adults too though likely best for kids 7 - 12 years of age.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer gelosa

customer_reviews.title: Super fun ping pong table!!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleasantly surprised with this ping pong table! The smaller size is perfect and does not take away from the fun once you get accustomed to playing on it. I really like that it is easy to take down and store away in a closet or under our bed. We do not have enough room for a full size table, and this is just what we needed. My husband and daughter play daily, and we have no plans to take it down any time soon. It arrived very well packaged with no damage, and was quick to set up. I would recommend this and would absolutely buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy table, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as described. Smaller than regulation but solidly made and easy to assemble - just pull the legs out and youre done. It is quite heavy in the box but the two pieces apart are easy to manage. It will be easy to store in my city home as it folds very flat. Can be also be used as a backup buffet table (covered) if needed! The quality is great and so is the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect compact ping pong table
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good quality table, sturdy. The size is great to play for both kids and adults. It looks good aesthetically as well. It comes pre-assembled, I got it set up and ready to play in a couple of minutes. highly recommended. i use it outdoors in my yard but i recommend to cover it up while not in use to prevent damage from sun/ rain (i live in Florida). And probably a good idea to store it indoors if not going to be used for prolonged period of time. I am very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Enrique

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: This ping pong table is pretty amazing really. It’s made very sturdy. The only downside is that it’s too small. Only 2 people can play at a time. I should had measured it out first. But we still like it and did not exchange it.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen B

customer_reviews.title: Too small. No customer service.
customer_reviews.text: This table is very heavy, too small to really play ping pong on. It also arrived at my apt with two feet missing and despite me contacting the company to get two feet sent to me I haven’t heard back from them. I don’t recommend getting this table.
customer_reviews.author: Eleonore Mangin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, Great fun, Quality build.
customer_reviews.text: This table is perfect for a medium size playroom, when we realized a full size wouldn't work. It is easy to move to other rooms or take in the car, but still very solidly built. Other small tables have thinner table tops and legs. There is minimal simple assembly. The family plays with this more than the video games in the same room. It looks great. Customer service is fantastic. There was a cosmetic blemish on the table and same day communication via phone/email with the rep took care of things right away. Don't forget you need paddles/balls. We ordered a Stiga combo pack with the table. We are very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Quality Lacking
customer_reviews.text: I received the table and it was missing 3 levelers and several screws to hold the table top to the support. I contacted Amazon and they recommended re-ordering another table and returning the original after receipt. I received the second table and it was missing one leveler and several screws, as well. I was able to piece together one table from the two and return the one. I don't know how the product will hold up, but be cautioned that it may take multiple tables to get one serviceable one.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Still awaiting help from STIGA - Poor Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Product is made of decent quality materials, however, I received the table with many screws missing, including one table leg that was never attached to the table by the manufacturer (no screws were ever even drilled during the assembly). I contacted the manufacturer to resolve, as directed in the assembly instructions, but have not received a response nearly a week later. I am willing to fix their manufacturing defects, but I need them to respond and send the screws that should have been included with the table.
customer_reviews.author: Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great action on smaller footprint
customer_reviews.text: Very good playing surface. Feels like actual ping pong even though smaller table. Was a big hit for Xmas. Box is heavy on delivery because tables are substantial. Assembly is five minutes max. Seems very high quality after two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Isinkso

customer_reviews.title: sturdy table and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy table and easy to put together. I like that you can use each section as individual game or entertainment tables. noting to build. I was afraid that tabe was going to be damaged as in the delivery process the package got pretty beaten up but it is was in perfect condition. Each section is a bit heavy but that is what makes these tables sturdy. Not a very large table but big enough to have some good times with. Make sure it is size you need before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Camilo Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Wish it longer
customer_reviews.text: Very bouncy surface. It appears to be the same quality as their full-sized tables. The only drawback is - it is not long enough. I don't mind too much it is narrower, but if you want to practice your game, then in most cases the ball will be going long. On the other hand, you can use each half as a small all-occasion table. Just put on a table cloth and off you go you get two small tables.
customer_reviews.author: K.W.

customer_reviews.title: Limited Space?  No Problem!
customer_reviews.text: We love our table! It's good quality and easy to set up and store away. I did my research before purchasing this table as I wanted to make sure it wasn't flimsy and it isn't. It's good quality, very sturdy. We aren't professional players and bought it just for fun but we still wanted to get our money's worth. We did! I would highly recommend this table to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Tammy M. Attama

customer_reviews.title: Very solid table and extremely easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The table arrived in an undamaged box. Upon opening the box I observed how well placed the packaging was around the table. Very solid table and extremely easy to assemble. The adjustable legs are a nice feature since we keep this set up in our garage which does not have a level floor. I highly recommend this table if you are looking for a well-built table for a small space!
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Mom

customer_reviews.title: durability
customer_reviews.text: It was the right size and perfect for our mobile home,my wife and I love playing ping pong in our air conditioned home during these stay home and very hot days,a great product
customer_reviews.author: chester tippinAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT OUTDOOR
customer_reviews.text: Totally not an outdoor table. The first time it rained it totally bubbled up and is absolutely garbage. If it was for indoor use it is fine. But NOT outdoor!
customer_reviews.author: Helen Amanda Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Fun ping pong table for our family. We bought it for BBQ weekends and something that we can all enjoy. It's easy to setup and play on. The table does feel a bit smaller then other tables I have played on. But it still serve it's purposes for fun on the weekends.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Small but effective
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical to buy used, but took the risk and I’m so glad I did! This is perfect for our garage! Our friends love coming over to play! It is considerably shorter than standard size, but we don’t have issues! Everyone loves it!
customer_reviews.author: roz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up/Compact/LOTS OF FUN!!!
customer_reviews.text: So my wife was hesitant when she found out that I didn't get her the full sized table by STIGA but she and my kids absolutely love this table. It comes assembled already and all you have to do is unfold the legs from each half, install the clamps to keep them together and then put the net on. The clamp as like little padded vices that you screw down by hand and each one has a little post on it for the next to slide down on. Seriously, the set up is TOO EASY!!! We've had hours of fun playing each other and look forward to one day buying a full sized table from STIGA!
customer_reviews.author: MDgirl87

customer_reviews.title: Great little starter table for the beginner family
customer_reviews.text: This table has great quality in materials it is made of and I expect it to last a long time. This table was really fun to play with beginners and is easy to fold up and put in the corner. Even as an intermediate player I could still use this table to work on drills with it being regulation height. Stiga is a great company that makes great products.
customer_reviews.author: Bullhamster

customer_reviews.title: Perfect compact ping pong table
customer_reviews.text: This table is amazing! My husband and I love playing ping pong but we just do not have the space for a regular sized table for inside. After thoroughly researching options I purchased this as a surprise for Christmas. We could not be more thrilled. It has the feel of a full size, the bounce is true, the net is taut, the legs adjust. Assembly was a breeze as the legs just unfold . It stores easily as it breaks into two tables. I am amazed by the quality. Now I just need to work on my finesse shots.
customer_reviews.author: Larasee

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Very good table. I don't have a big yard and space in side my home to keep a large tennis table. Due to this I was looking for table that I can fit in the garage, and can be folded and stored when not in use. This exactly matches that. Though the table size is smaller than the original table, we don't feel it. Use this every weekend. One advantage is once we get used to this table, we can play on the original sized one very easily. The quality of the table is very good and the product was received without any defect.
customer_reviews.author: philipmat

customer_reviews.title: Great size table ; easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: The ping pong table arrived within 2 days of ordering. It was packaged nicely and securely. Installation went very quick as the legs are built into the table tops and simply fold out. The height of the legs are adjustable to allow for quick leveling. The table seems to be built very well. I'm used to playing on a full size table ; this table is a little narrower and shorter than a full size table. Once you get your "game" adjusted to playing on a smaller table, it is a lot of fun. Our family will be able to enjoy this table for many years. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: DaveyTN

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: It’s a piece of crap. The first table was good. The second table had all bent joining rods. We have somehow unfolded it but the legs are still crooked.
customer_reviews.author: Richa Sarathi

customer_reviews.title: Plays great, you don't even notice it's smaller.
customer_reviews.text: I live in a home with a smaller basement and a normal size table wouldn't even fit down the stairs, so my only option was to find a smaller table. Bought the Space-Saver and was skeptical at first, but it it turns out it plays like a normal size table. It sounds cliche, but it's been great fun for the family. Oh yeah, they were right, full set-up takes mere minutes as you open the box, unfold the table sides, and fasten the net, that's it. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: ILS

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Ping Pong Table
customer_reviews.text: Table arrived promptly and in excellent condition. Due to weight, we unpacked upstairs and carried each end downstairs separately. It took no time to set up. Although I was used to a full-sized table, I quickly figured out how to play on this size table. It looks good and has a good sound. We are very happy with what we paid for this fun table, and we think it's great for a smaller room.
customer_reviews.author: Lifehiker

customer_reviews.title: It is a good product. I have not used it yet as ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids and I play nearly every day on this. It is a good product. I have not used it yet as a compact table but I can see how it can be useful if we needed a wide table to work on something like an art project. The net and the legs are not flimsy or low quality and they look pretty professional. The legs do not have rollers but they are not heavy so you can maneuver around without great difficulty. I would recommend this product to anyone wanting to play table tennis with family members and friends. Basically, a good starter product for getting into table tennis.
customer_reviews.author: Cyto S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size! One minor flaw
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size for my two boys (8&10) and it doesn't take up a lot of space. I love that it comes apart so easily for storage. It was crazy easy to put together too! The only reason is got 4 instead of 5 stars is that it would be wonderful to have some kind of leg locking mechanism for when they are folded up for storage. If not carried correctly, they keep falling down.
customer_reviews.author: trayjaye

customer_reviews.title: The perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this ping pong table for our 13 and 7 year old for Christmas this year. They love it! It was the perfect addition to our new bonus room and finally something they can play together. It is very sturdy and easy to fold up. The compact size is just right for inside the house and makes it easy for young players to learn.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Becker

customer_reviews.title: What a disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: There is no net, no net post in the package, and one of the leg's food pad is missing. Have to return this table. What a disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Lightupyoursmile

customer_reviews.title: Looks small, but it works just fine.
customer_reviews.text: Is a great little table for having inside your house when you don't have room for a full size. It's very stable and already has given us lots of happy hours of challenging matches. The Box was torn up when it arrived and it is missing one of its rubber feet but I am assuming I can get them to send me a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Burgeson

customer_reviews.title: Great table for the price, also saves space.
customer_reviews.text: extremely easy to install, you just unfold the legs and clamp the metal pieces then place the net on. only issue is if you do plan to move it around, you'd need to be careful as it's basically 2 tables joined together, so you may want to unclamp the nets first
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Ou

customer_reviews.title: Well made, compact size great for our space
customer_reviews.text: Not full size but perfect for a spare area that we didn’t know how to use. It’s well made, and easy to set up without being flimsy. Would recommend it to anyone with some spare space and want to try table tennis!
customer_reviews.author: Ben T

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: We received our table but was missing both the net and net posts. It’s been very frustrating because no one has been able to help resolve the problem. What a disappointment to open this on Christmas morning and be missing parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Nice but leg bent
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice space saving table, the only issue I have is that the one leg was bent upon arrival. I have emailed Stiga customer service but have not heard back as of today
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor fun
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about this table is the ease to assemble and store; this being approx 2/3rd the size of an actual table makes it an ideal starter table to learn table tennis. You get your exercise and fun and then store it perfectly in a corner of the house with no problem at all, couldn’t have asked for more!
customer_reviews.author: NageshChopra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect convenient size, easy to move and store (if you can get the kids to stop playing)
customer_reviews.text: We love this table-it is the perfect size for our family. I like that we can use it as two tables if the need arises. Our family has spent hours playing it already-it is well constructed. The package arrived with the outer carton damaged but the table is in perfect condition. Easy to set up, simple to move as needed. No bulky storage. Exactly what i was hoping for!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G

customer_reviews.title: Came without a net and then company sent wrong poles twice
customer_reviews.text: Table came without poles and net. I contacted the company and they send me twice the wrong poles and a damaged net the first time. If you are looking for a decent quality item from a serious company look somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique C.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality table
customer_reviews.text: This table was a Christmas present for our children and we all love it! Great bounce and very sturdy. I would recommend to anyone who doesn’t have the space for a full table.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Game  On For All Ages
customer_reviews.text: Our 7 year old grandson wanted to play ping pong. Wish it was a couple inches longer on each side, but it’s perfect for the space in garage where they, and friends, play. They keep that side of garage door open so area gets air.,
customer_reviews.author: booklover*

customer_reviews.title: Compact in size, but not compact in fun!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit in the basement. Was a better choice then putting a full size regulation table with the limited room I have. The table is very quality, sturdy, and durable. Assembly was super simple, just two sides of table with legs that push together. Only complaint is the net. Kinda cheap but it works. Although there are easy alternatives to the stock net. But overall, this table is the best for the value and size.
customer_reviews.author: RPB

customer_reviews.title: An excellent ping pong table at any price.
customer_reviews.text: I just received my STIGA Space Saver Table Tennis Table. I couldn't be more pleased. It is a beautiful piece of equipment which I will keep set up in the middle of my living room. It is very sturdy. I am thrilled with the color of the top which is a dark grayish blue which is very easy on the eyes. It also has a superb surface.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the Quarantine
customer_reviews.text: Got this so we would have something to do in the quarantine. Fits on our deck well and is fun to play.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Arrived sound and well
customer_reviews.text: I got this table and I am happy about this product! Looks nice, and it is easy to install , as all the component are already assembled, so pretty much open the box and make it stand up! They are a little heavy but you expect that on a table that will provide some support! not complaints there! Looking forward to sharing some good ping pong and other games on this table! Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: J. H. Arribasplata

customer_reviews.title: Playability
customer_reviews.text: This STIGA Compact Table Tennis was perfect for playing in my small house. It was easy to assemble and the quality of the table was excellent! I would recommend this brand of table tennis to any one that loves to play, but has only a small area in which they can play it in. It bring loads of fun an excitement to any gathering.
customer_reviews.author: fbabiez

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: This is great quality. Very sturdy and built well. Not to mention a cinch to set up. No complicated assembly, just putting net on and squeezing tight so the the 2 halves stay together. This table is built so much stronger than the same type from Joola. We had the Joola and it just collapsed, and the legs ripped off table.
customer_reviews.author: Dani P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly sized table!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this table for about a week. We love the compact size ( it measures 72”x41”) and while it does take a bit to get used to the smaller size, we all adjusted nicely. I actually think it helps to improve your game because you need to use more control. It’s a little too small to play doubles, but it would work if you don’t mind bumping elbows. It is a solid table, and I love how it separates into two individual tables. We are planning to store the tables under our bed when not in use and use them as dining tables when needed. We’re very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: momoftrucklover

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully constructed, plays great
customer_reviews.text: This table is beautiful and fun to play on. It's a skosh smaller than I expected, but it is perfect for my 12 year-old daughter, for whom I bought it as a birthday gift. I prefer playing on this small table to a standard table.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but came with scratches
customer_reviews.text: The product overall is good, but it came with scratches on the surface and sides. Seems like it was used as the scratches were on the side and on the top(total 3-4 places)..felt like cheated.
customer_reviews.author: Siddharth Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Excedes expectations
customer_reviews.text: I love this ping pong table. It takes less than 5 minutes from box to actually playing. The quality is excellent, it really is just like a shunk down ping pong table, and it fits a tiny roon I have in my apartment .I like that it is actually 2 tables set together, I use one half when I want to play my rod hockey game (That is also by Stiga). You just fold the legs under the other half. I play with my kids and we are having a blast.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Moore

customer_reviews.title: Solid piece of gaming equipment!
customer_reviews.text: Usually home gaming equipment at this price is not well made. Not the case here. It is solid, goes together quickly, and can be put away in a couple of minutes. Table surface is strong and level. The compact size did not detract from game play at all. Family is loving it!
customer_reviews.author: petey

customer_reviews.title: Great table and works perfectly for us without having a permanent space to have set up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I didn't have space for a permanent set up. The table looks professional, and works great in the small spaces we have.. It appears to be well built. I would have preferred to have squeeze grip net vs screw on, but hey - I just put some felt pads to ensure that the table doesn't get marked as I tighten them up... Great for the family to play around over holidays...
customer_reviews.author: R S.

customer_reviews.title: Great table. Becareful when assembling or storing.
customer_reviews.text: The box was heavily damaged when delivered because of the delivery man. The table's corner was also slightly damaged, although it had protective covering. We decided to suck it up and love it for the great quality. The ball bounces and spins well and it is easy to assemble. The table shakes easily and pretty noisy. The metal hinge lock on the leg bent when I tried to store the table for the first time. I bent it back into shape. Overall I am very happy to have a table tennis table.
customer_reviews.author: Yasuo Maehata

customer_reviews.title: Great value and well made
customer_reviews.text: Awesome table. We first bought a regular sized one that was expensive and it came bowed and damaged, we quickly realized also we needed some more space so we opted for this one based on reviews. Man, this thing is solid! Great quality and super easy to put together (just unfold the legs and clamp the net). The surface is nice and the build quality on this thing is fantastic. Highly recommended! Definitely don't hesitate to buy if you need to save space but want a premium quality table!
customer_reviews.author: Damn Good Brands

customer_reviews.title: Good quality table for reasonable price, fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a Christmas gift for my 10 and 12 year old boys. It was easy to assemble, my husband said it took him a few minutes to do it. We have a narrow room in the basement so that is why we bought this smaller table so it would fit and still be easy to move around it. It seems very sturdy (we've had it and the boys have been playing on it every day since Christmas and it's held up very well!) I would say this table was a huge win! It also doubles for a nice little snack/drink table in the basement when the kids are eating or watching tv downstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: High-quality compact table
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a ping pong table for our basement but have limited space. This Stiga Space Saver table fits the bill. We're especially pleased with the quality of the table and its easy maneuverability. It was a good choice for us.
customer_reviews.author: Maryanna B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Table
customer_reviews.text: We have always wanted a ping pong table but the regulation size ones where just a little too big for our space. We found this one and decided to give it a shot. The table is fantastic. The size is perfect for our space and the quality is excellent. Our girls love playing and it will bring hours of fun. Assembly could not have been easier. The table is fully assembled and you merely unfold the legs, put the 2 pieces together, and hang the net. Then you are ready to go. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner ping pong table
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable high quality...stores well and is sturdy., We like the feature that it can become two separate card tables for board game play. We have it set up in the family room for winter play and will move it outside in the Spring and Summer.
customer_reviews.author: Cautious buyer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, compact.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this brand new from Amazon. The box arrived in pretty rough shape and we were worried that the table would be damaged. Fortunately, it was fine, so don't be too scared when it arrives! The table is folds open and closed easily, but I don't think we'll be storing this every time we're done playing. It's heavy enough that it might be easier to keep it in one place. I guess I'm saying that if you plan on storing this after using it, make it a two-person job! Otherwise, it's a really nice table.
customer_reviews.author: CaptainQuirk

customer_reviews.title: Having so much fun with this
customer_reviews.text: All the kids and adults can play together. It's strong and as advertised. Folds up for storage is a big plus. You will need a "ball cat" to chase the balls that go in every direction. Don't worry they return them quickly :)
customer_reviews.author: Big Bird

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Table is sturdy and fits easily in the 2nd bedroom of my apartment where a standard sized table would not have worked. The table is sturdy and the legs have adjustments to insure that the table is level. Set up took less that 5 minutes--just unpack, unfold, and put on the net holders and net. It is exactly what I was hoping for!
customer_reviews.author: Chris A.

customer_reviews.title: Great table,, Well constructed and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: You cannot go wrong with this slightly scaled down table version. Stiga is a respected brand and they delivered on that quality with this table. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: wesley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for game room
customer_reviews.text: This is a great option for a smaller ping pong table. Item comes packaged extremely well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: It's all ball bearings

customer_reviews.title: It is an AMAZING table.
customer_reviews.text: The playability is sensational! It's a great quality table with extremely easy assembly! There are many things to like, but the aesthetics are especially other-worldly!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for family
customer_reviews.text: We got this setup this week. Enjoying family time with Stiga table. Awesome size for all ages. It's our daily family routine now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This table is awesome. I like that you can adjust the height ...
customer_reviews.text: This table is awesome. I like that you can adjust the height of each leg incase you have an uneven floor, something I do have. The table is slightly smaller than I would've liked, but it's loads of fun. I highly recommend if you're looking for a portable ping pong table.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Table Tennis anyone? (as long as you are under 14)
customer_reviews.text: Great table for the 14 an under crowd. My kids and their friends spend hours playing tournaments on this thing. The really cool part? When we don't need to use it, it folds up to half it's size for storage. Oh, and the price is nice. Win/Win/Win!
customer_reviews.author: Middle Class American

customer_reviews.title: It looks really nice too! The box was pretty roughed up and ...
customer_reviews.text: My son and I are really enjoying this table. It is pre-assembled into 2 pieces. It looks really nice too! The box was pretty roughed up and one of the frame pieces are damaged. Amazon customer service is sending me a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love this table
customer_reviews.text: We love this table. Very sturdy and looks great. It does take some time to adjust to the smaller size, but after finishing our basement we didn't have the space for a full sized table any more - so this is the perfect solution!
customer_reviews.author: gnnabl8

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the STIGA Compact Tennis TGable after returning a JOOLA midsize compact table. The JOOLA table top was made from really poor quality particle board. The screws that attached the table base/legs couldn't stay in place because the particle board was so crumbly. The table was so fragile, I returned it immediately. The STIGA table is the opposite. It's really strong, sturdy and stable. Our family loves this table, I would totally recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value.  Sturdy construction
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. It has been in constant use since we've got it. Very sturdy construction. It has the feel of a full-sized table. Perfect for a room that can't handle a regulation table. Easy to store and get it out of the way. I wish I had bought this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this table! Sturdy, normal height, big enough for a fun game between 2 people! Item came all together in one box. No damage as the corners had rubber edge pads. We bought the paddle set separately.
customer_reviews.author: LA1960

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Quality
customer_reviews.text: We were surprised by how closely play on this smaller table resembles full size. We have not room for a larger table, but this fits our room well. Also surprised by the high quality of this product. If you have space limitations, and enjoy table tennis, you will not be disappointed by this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent table
customer_reviews.text: Great table! We set it up in our basement play room for older kids but needed a reasonably-sized table so it wouldn't take up the whole playroom. This was perfect. It doesn't feel like I am using a small table - the adults use it too - yet it is a good size. Easy to put together and has held up well with my sons. Would give it 5 stars but it can be a little difficult to move around the room once it is all set up since the two halves can come apart if you don't have enough people carrying it and holding it together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No assembly - perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Quality table esp. for the price. Perfect size for small spaces, but still fun to play. Good bounce on the table, and best part no assembly. Easy to set up and fold away. I would have give it 5 stars if it came completely free of defects, but on the side of the table, the whole side is roughed up and there's a smudge on one side of the table.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Linder

customer_reviews.title: Ping to the Pong...
customer_reviews.text: I love this table...made very well...set up is easy...plays nice....I look forward to many years getting my pong on....peace out...and keep up the great work...a nice product for a nice price....
customer_reviews.author: Virginia L. Castro

customer_reviews.title: Loving it so far, but how long will it last?
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to adapt to smaller size and it's a lot of fun. I am concerned about durability. Fingers crossed. But so far we are really happy with the set up and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Sharkfish

customer_reviews.title: Good table, bad net clamps
customer_reviews.text: The table itself is great quality, but the net clamps were garbage. I literally had to bend them to fit on each side of the table. It was rather disappointing, because everything else about the table has been great (i.e. easy to level, heavy and sturdy, space saver capability, mutli-use as a card table).
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Table!
customer_reviews.text: This ping pong table is outstanding for the price. I read all of the high reviews, but still wasn’t expecting such a high quality product. We love it! Great that it already comes assembled too!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: A great set for those without a lot of room to spare
customer_reviews.text: LOVING this little table tennis setup. Perfect size for me to work on improving my control and a great size for my two young kiddos (ages 5 & 7) to get accustomed to hitting the ball and it actually going over the net. They would often get frustrated with a full-size table and this is a good "intro" to the game for them without the discouragement. Not to mention it's easy up and ready to play in minutes. When not in regular use it can easily be stored in a bedroom, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: STIGA Table is a winner!
customer_reviews.text: The table arrived on time and undamaged. It was very heavy in the box but once you open the box and separate the tables it was easy to lift and set up. The size is perfect for my home. I plan to leave it setup between my dining room and living room so I can play often. I love the fact that when I need to move it I can separate into two tables. This is a great table and I will recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Virofras

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased, exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Extremely pleased with this table. Despite it's smaller size we are able to play competitive games. We set it up in the foyer so we don't have to move other furniture. I've even played by myself by setting one table against the wall. Great exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Great starter table!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so great! We bought this table for our kids for Christmas and they have played every day for hours since. My husband put it together on Christmas Eve in less than 20 minutes and it was was super easy. Great size for kids but not too small for adults to play either. Perfect size for our basement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact, Fun, and Multifunctional
customer_reviews.text: This is no flimsy little table. High quality and compact, yet heavy duty. Just throw a tablecloth on top and it can also be used as a small rectangular table or two square tables! The best part is there is no assembly. It comes fully assembled in the box. Just pop out the legs and you are done. It also folds nicely for storage if you want. My kids love it! I love that they have something fun to do and its not taking up my entire rec room.
customer_reviews.author: AV8TR

product_meta.title: STIGA Space Saver Compact Table Tennis Table for Authentic Play at Regulation Height with a Scaled Down Size for Easy Storage
product_meta.description: Perfect for apartments, small office spaces, or any tight space that needs an added dose of fun, the STIGA Space Saver table tennis table gives you authentic play at regulation height with a scaled down size of 71” L x 40.5” W x 30” H. This table delivers ultimate utility with the flexibility to be used for non-stop table tennis action, multi-purpose entertaining needs, or simply folded and stored away in the closet or under the bed. The table features a durable white powder-coated steel frame and 1.25” welded square steel legs. The 5/8” thick MDF tabletop includes smooth and durable silkscreen striping that is comparable in quality and finish to full sized STIGA tables. The top is supported by a 1.25” welded tubular steel apron for consistent bounce across the entire table top. The apron features durable powder coating and a silkscreened STIGA logo that resist wear and tear for a quality look that will last. Adjustable leg levelers ensure a level playing surface even when the floors are uneven. To complete the game, the STIGA Space Saver table includes a full net and post system.
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes One STIGA Compact Table Tennis Table, net with post system and leg levelers. Rackets and balls are not included

Table tennis table dimensions: Assembled – 70" L x 40.5" W x 30" H | Individual Half – 35.5 '' L x 40.5'' W x 30'' H | Combined Folded dimensions – 35.5” L x 40.5” W x 3.6” H | Assembled weight: 79 lbs | Thickness – 1.8”
No assembly required – simply unpack, unfold, and play

Sturdy 1.25” square welded steel legs create a solid base and are powder coated for a durable finish. Molded leg levelers protect your floors from scratches and adjust the table height to ensure a perfectly flat play surface

The MDF tabletop is finished with a repeat roller coat process to create a smooth, level-playing surface and is lined with silkscreen striping that is printed directly on the tabletop for a perfect finish. Indoor play only is recommended

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
